description: When mapping stories, carefully distinguish between sequential spine (essential path) and optional paths, alternate routes, or additional functionality that is not strictly essential. Sequential stories form the mandatory flow; optional stories are alternatives, enhancements, or non-essential features.

do.description: Identify the essential spine and mark optional paths clearly

guidance.description: Identify the minimum mandatory sequential flow required to deliver core value
example: 1. User enters email and password (sequential_order: 1, mandatory)
2. User verifies email via link (sequential_order: 2, mandatory)

guidance.description: Mark alternative authentication or workflow paths as optional since only one path is needed
example: 2a. User logs in with email/password (sequential_order: 2, mandatory spine)
2b. User logs in with Google (sequential_order: 2, optional: true alternate)
2c. User logs in with Facebook (sequential_order: 2, optional: true alternate)

guidance.description: Mark customization, personalization, and nice-to-have features as optional enhancements that branch from the spine
example: 3. User customizes dashboard layout (optional: true, priority: 1 enhancement)
4. User sets dashboard preferences (optional: true, priority: 2 enhancement)
5. User shares dashboard with team (optional: true, priority: 3 enhancement)

guidance.description: Mark error handling and edge case scenarios as optional since the happy path is the essential spine
example: 3a. System handles payment failure (optional: true, priority: 1 error handling)
3b. System retries failed payment (optional: true, priority: 2 error handling)

dont.description: Don't mark everything as sequential, don't omit optional markers

guidance.description: Don't treat alternative authentication methods as separate sequential steps - only one method is needed so alternatives should be optional
example: User Authentication (WRONG - all marked as spine):
Why Wrong: Only one authentication method is needed. Google and Facebook should be optional: true alternates.

guidance.description: Don't treat customization and enhancement features as part of the mandatory sequential spine - mark them as optional
example: Dashboard Flow (WRONG - enhancements marked as spine):
Why Wrong: Only viewing dashboard is mandatory. Customization, preferences, and sharing should be optional: true enhancements.

guidance.description: Don't forget to mark error handling and edge cases as optional - they're not part of the essential happy path spine
example: Why Wrong: Payment failure and retry are error handling, not mandatory spine. Should be marked optional: true.
